I literally wear this so often. It's soft, fits perfectly and stays up!! It's super flattering and I just thought the stripes were so cute.

评论详情: I like the shirt a lot. It's very cute but this shirt is definitely not an everyday shirt. I feel like the pattern is cute, it just does not go with everything.  This shirt was bought for a teenager, and it was definitely appropriate. It looks great on her and it will look great on you too.
Looks great- fun layering piece
Fits a little snug but was perfect to deliver a baby in and continue for skin to skin
Little bigger than expected, quality is okay.

At first I was annoyed because there was no tag showing front to back but there is a tag at the inner seam so I was able to get the top and front oriented correctly. I put it on an was pleasantly surprised by the fit, look and comfort. I may buy another in a different color. So cute and versatile. Can be worn alone or layered underneath something. I really like it!
I love this tube top. It’s not see through and very comfortable. I liked the length and would definitely buy again!

This top is perfect for summer! Great pop of color to add to your closet and fits well. Tube top was not too short on me, and felt like a great material.
Has a stretchy but kind of grippy elastic at the top, works nicely and doesn’t fall down!
Not cropped. Not too long. Great for the price.

So I wore this to the Indy 500. For anyone who frequents the race or knows anything about it well then you know it’s a long crazy, wild day. This shirt definitely held up. It even held through the monsoon that decided to grace its appearance that day without any sheer or see throughness. I didn’t wear anything underneath if that tells you anything. Buy it you won’t be disappointed!
Very cute top great price.  I am  34 DD5”5  124 lbs.  l I bought the small and it fits. Not to tight  Just for reference

I was a little nervous ordering this top because there wasn’t a ton of reviews but this is my new favorite top. Its so soft and fits perfect, its not see through and for about 15$ this is definitely worth it.

I only took of a star because according to the size chart I am a large but I should have gotten an XL. I have DD's and the girls barely fit in this thing. Other than that it is so soft, stays up and great quality material.

I got size Small for my daughter that wears about a size 2-4 and the fit is good.  Her physique looks identical to the model and the fit was the same as shown.  It is not see through so she just wears her pasties instead of a bra. I would say if you have a larger chest choose maybe a size up from your normal size as it is a tight fit. Overall a nice summer piece for a good price!
Fits true to size and material is not thin
Nice comfortable material and good color options. Fits as expected. Had some smell but disappeared after the first wash

My teen daughter wears an XS and this fit fine in size S. She loves this top. It is cute, soft, and comfortable. She likes the ribbed material, the striped pattern, and the color. It stays up and in position just fine. It washed/dried nicely, too.

This is a very cute tube top with subtle pink and white stripes. I got my typical size, medium, and it fits, but is a little on the tighter side. I think this is how it is meant to fit though so I will keep it. Also, it is slightly cropped, but with higher waisted Shorts or pants you could also cover your stomach. The fit seems to be snug enough that it will stay in position, but did not seem to pinch at my armpits, which is something that I look for in this type of top. Very pleased with this and looking forward to wearing it.

This tube top fits my daughter about as expected. It's a classic design and made for summer comfort. It's thick where it counts and priced well. It has the fit and style she wanted and the value is there on this cotton blended top.
